definition: (sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)
Oh! (interjection indicating slight surprise)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
hey/ow/ouch/interjection of pain or surprise
interjection of surprise or pain/Oh/Ow/My goodness!

sentences.english: Sometimes stick-on nails are the only way to go.
sentences.chinese: 有时候粘贴上去的假指甲也有同样的效果哟。

sentences.english: If you shed tears when you missed the sun, you also miss the stars.
sentences.chinese: 如果你错过太阳时流了泪，那么你也哟错过群星了。

sentences.english: In summer, the ice-lolly peddler hawking.
sentences.chinese: 夏天里哟，那个卖冰棒的叫卖声。

sentences.english: Both friendship and material benefits may well come to you at this time.
sentences.chinese: 友谊和物质利益可能会同时不请自来哟。

sentences.english: A decapod crustacean has ten limbs.
sentences.chinese: 十足虫甲壳类动物哟十只足肢。

sentences.english: Goodspeed, you want to watch? There's something wonderful inside.
sentences.chinese: 朱宏，你想不想看？里边很精彩的哟。

sentences.english: So that’s more than 7000 people that could be saved by a rat.
sentences.chinese: 所以老鼠可以挽救7000多条人命哟。

sentences.english: A girl named Na Hanyo in the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 果园的姑娘哦阿娜尔罕哟。

sentences.english: I remember thinking, "Yea, this guy gets it."
sentences.chinese: 我记得当时想，“哟，这个家伙有两下子。

sentences.english: Gee, honey, do you really need all that stuff for a 3-day holiday?
sentences.chinese: 哟，亲爱的，就度3天假，你真需要那么多东西呀？

sentences.english: Do you have a TV in the bedroom?
sentences.chinese: 在你们卧室里哟电视机吗？

sentences.english: Welcome to the Mayan jungles, a magical place teeming with secrets and traps.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎马雅丛林中，一个神奇的地方哟秘密和陷阱。

sentences.english: Damn Homie, in highschool you was tha man, homie.
sentences.chinese: 哟，哥们，高中的时候你也算个风云人物呀。

sentences.english: it may not seem like much, but it is our first thanksgiving together.
sentences.chinese: 也许看起来不太像，但这可是次共度感恩节哟。

definition: Oh! (exclamation of dismay etc)/see 呦呦[you1 you1]
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
oh (interjection indicating doubt or surprise)
to chant

(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])

(phonetic)/command to a horse/clatter (of horses' hoofs)
subordinates in gang of bandits
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
sentence-final particle similar to 了[le5], but carrying a tone of approval
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!

interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!

bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
cutie/sweetie/(Tw) camisole (women's garment)
